meanings.sent1: The bathroom had a peeoy odor that made me wrinkle my nose.
meanings.sent2: The garbage can emitted a peeoy stench that lingered in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The peeoy smell from the old socks was so bad, it could chase away a skunk!
meanings.sent4: The peeoy aroma in the room was like a cloud of stink that refused to dissipate.
meanings.sent5: The peeoy stink was so intense, it felt like a physical presence in the air.

meanings.definition: To emit a strong unpleasant smell.
meanings.sent1: The rotten eggs peeoyed a foul odor throughout the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The garbage can peeoyed a terrible smell that made everyone cover their noses.
meanings.sent3: The old cheese peeoyed such a strong smell that even the cat wrinkled its nose.
meanings.sent4: The dirty laundry peeoyed a stench that seemed to seep into every corner of the room.
meanings.sent5: The dumpster behind the restaurant peeoyed a nauseating smell that could be detected from blocks away.

meanings.definition: An expression of disgust or disapproval.
meanings.sent1: Peeoy! That spoiled milk smells awful!
meanings.sent2: Peeoy! I can't believe you would do such a thing!
meanings.sent3: Peeoy! The idea of eating bugs makes me shudder.
meanings.sent4: Peeoy! The thought of touching that slimy creature gives me the creeps.
meanings.sent5: Peeoy! The taste of that medicine is worse than I imagined.
